trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of bindings and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that are used to validate an object.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di associazioni e <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> oggetti utilizzati per convalidare un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A BindingGroup creates a relationship between multiple bindings, which can be validated and updated together.
trans-unit.target: Un BindingGroup crea una relazione tra più associazioni, che possono essere convalidate e aggiornate insieme.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si supponga che un'applicazione richiede all'utente di immettere un indirizzo.

trans-unit.source: The application then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided.
trans-unit.target: L'applicazione quindi popola un oggetto di tipo `Address`, che dispone di proprietà, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, e `Country`, con i valori immessi dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The application has a panel that contains four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> controls, each of which is data bound to one of the object’s properties.
trans-unit.target: L'applicazione include un pannello che contiene quattro <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>controlli, ognuno dei quali è associato a una delle proprietà dell'oggetto dati.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> in a BindingGroup to validate the `Address` object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>in un BindingGroup differente per convalidare il `Address` oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If the bindings participate in the same BindingGroup, you can ensure that the zip-code is valid for the country of the address.
trans-unit.target: Se le associazioni di partecipano al BindingGroup stesso, è possibile garantire che il codice postale valido per il paese dell'indirizzo.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A>proprietà su <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child elements inherit the BindingGroup from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio ereditano il BindingGroup dagli elementi padre, come con qualsiasi altra proprietà ereditabile.

trans-unit.source: A binding on a descendent element is added to a BindingGroup if one of the following situations occurs: - The binding's source and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the BindingGroup are the same object and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Un'associazione a un elemento discendente viene aggiunto a un BindingGroup differente, se si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:-l'origine dell'associazione e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>dell'elemento che ha il BindingGroup sono lo stesso oggetto e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>non è impostata.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of the binding is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> and they are not explicitly set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>è uguale alla proprietà dell'associazione di <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>e non è impostate esplicitamente su `null`.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the example of the address, suppose that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> is set to the object of type `Address`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio dell'indirizzo, si supponga che il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>è impostato per l'oggetto di tipo `Address`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The binding for each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is added to the BindingGroup of the panel.
trans-unit.target: L'associazione per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>viene aggiunto a BindingGroup del pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects to a BindingGroup.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>oggetti a un BindingGroup differente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The BindingGroup is passed as the first parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> runs.
trans-unit.target: Il BindingGroup viene passato come primo parametro del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>metodo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>viene eseguito.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method on that BindingGroup to get the proposed values of the object, and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> property to get the sources of the bindings.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29>metodo su tale BindingGroup per ottenere i valori dell'oggetto, proposti e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>proprietà da ottenere le origini delle associazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BindingGroup updates the sources of the binding at the same time instead of each binding being updated separately.
trans-unit.target: Un BindingGroup Aggiorna le origini di associazione nello stesso momento anziché aggiornare separatamente ogni associazione.

trans-unit.source: When you call one of the methods to validate the data (<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>), the binding for each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> in the example is validated and potentially updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama uno dei metodi per convalidare i dati (<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>), l'associazione per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>nell'esempio viene convalidata e potenzialmente aggiornata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a binding is part of a BindingGroup, the source of the binding is not updated until you call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> on the BindingGroup, unless you explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'associazione fa parte di un BindingGroup differente, l'origine dell'associazione non viene aggiornato finché non si chiama <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>su BindingGroup, a meno che non è impostato in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Begins an edit transaction on the sources in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avvia una transazione di modifica per le origini nel <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the sources in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> support discarding pending changes, you can call BeginEdit to begin the edit transaction, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> to save the pending changes, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A> to discard the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Se le origini di <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>supportano l'annullamento delle modifiche in sospeso, è possibile chiamare BeginEdit per avviare la transazione di modifica, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>per salvare le modifiche in sospeso, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A>per annullare le modifiche in sospeso.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, BeginEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Per ogni oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>che implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chiamate BeginEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects that contains information for each Binding in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> gli oggetti che contiene informazioni per ogni associazione nel <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> if one of the following cases occurs: - The binding's source and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> are the same object and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> is not set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>appartiene a un <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>Se si verifica uno dei casi seguenti:-l'origine dell'associazione e il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>dell'elemento che ha il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>lo stesso oggetto e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>non è impostata.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of the binding and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> are set to the same non-null value and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>proprietà dell'associazione e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>impostati sullo stesso valore non null e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>appartiene a un elemento padre dell'elemento di destinazione del binding.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You add a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> to BindingExpressions.
trans-unit.target: -Si aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>per BindingExpressions.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects that contains information for each binding in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> gli oggetti che contiene informazioni per ogni associazione nel <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends the edit transaction and discards the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Termina la transazione di modifica ed Elimina le modifiche in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: This method causes the sources to discard the pending changes, if a source object is capable of doing so and end the edit transaction.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo determina le origini annullare le modifiche in sospeso, se un oggetto di origine è in grado di farlo e terminare la transazione di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Then the method updates the target properties with the saved source values.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo quindi aggiorna le proprietà di destinazione con i valori di origine salvata.

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, CancelEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Per ogni oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>che implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chiamate CancelEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether each source in the binding can discard pending changes and restore the original values.
trans-unit.target: Indica se ogni origine di associazione può annullare le modifiche in sospeso e ripristinare i valori originali.

trans-unit.source: A source can discard pending changes if it implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.
trans-unit.target: Un'origine può annullare le modifiche in sospeso se implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if each source in the binding can discard pending changes and restore the original values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ogni origine di associazione può annullare le modifiche in sospeso e ripristinare i valori originali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs all the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects and updates the binding sources if all validation rules succeed.
trans-unit.target: Esegue tutti i <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> oggetti e aggiorna le origini di associazione, se tutte le regole di convalida hanno esito positivo.

trans-unit.source: If every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> succeeds, this method causes the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction, if a source object is capable of doing so.
trans-unit.target: Se ogni <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>ha esito positivo, questo metodo provoca le origini per il commit delle modifiche in sospeso e terminare la transazione di modifica, se un'origine dell'oggetto è in grado di eseguire l'operazione necessaria.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, CommitEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Per ogni oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>che implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chiamate CommitEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if every <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> succeeds and the values are committed to the sources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> ha esito positivo e i valori sono salvata per le origini; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the proposed value for the specified property and item.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore specificato per la proprietà specificata e l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the value to be committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per ottenere il valore per eseguire il commit all'origine.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value depends on the stage at which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del valore restituito dipende dalla fase in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is data bound to a property of type integer and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that calls GetValue has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the method returns a string.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>è associato a dati a una proprietà di tipo integer e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>che chiama GetValue ha relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, il metodo restituisce una stringa.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the method returns whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>è relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, il metodo restituisce il tipo restituito dal convertitore dell'associazione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: In this example, GetValue usually returns an integer.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio GetValue restituisce in genere un numero intero.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The property whose proposed value to get.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà il cui valore proposto da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The proposed property value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà proposto.

trans-unit.source: There is not a binding for the specified item and property.
trans-unit.target: Non è un'associazione per la proprietà e l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà specificata non è disponibile, a causa di un errore di conversione o una precedente regola di convalida non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> has a failed validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> dispone di una regola di convalida non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> has a failed validation rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> dispone di una regola di convalida non riuscita; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> contains a proposed value that has not been written to the source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> contiene un valore proposto non è stato scritto per l'origine.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> contains a proposed value that has not been written to the source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> contiene un valore proposto non è stato scritto per l'origine; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sources that are used by the Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le origini utilizzate dagli oggetti di associazione nel <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each object that is used as a source is added into the Items property once, even if the object is used as the source for multiple bindings.
trans-unit.target: Ogni oggetto che viene utilizzato come origine viene aggiunto nella proprietà di elementi di una volta, anche se l'oggetto viene utilizzato come origine per più associazioni.

trans-unit.source: Often, there is just one item in Items, which is the object that is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Spesso, è presente un solo elemento negli elementi, ovvero l'oggetto che è l' <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>elemento che utilizza <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> to have multiple sources, however.
trans-unit.target: È possibile che un <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>di disporre di più origini, tuttavia.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For example, if Binding objects share the same <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> but use different source objects, each object that is used as a source is in Items.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se gli oggetti di associazione condividono lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>ma utilizzare oggetti di origine diversi, ogni oggetto che viene utilizzato come origine negli elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can also be multiple objects in Items if the path of a Binding resolves to a nested property of the source.
trans-unit.target: Può anche contenere più oggetti negli elementi se il percorso di un'associazione può essere risolto in una proprietà annidata dell'origine.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> control's binding is a part of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> is a `Customer` object, which has a property of type `Address`.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga, ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>associazione del controllo non fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e il relativo <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>è un `Customer` object, che contiene una proprietà di tipo `Address`.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is the `Address.ZipCode` property, the `Address` is added to the Items property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>è il `Address.ZipCode` proprietà, il `Address` viene aggiunto alla proprietà Items.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sources that are used by the Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Le origini utilizzate dagli oggetti di associazione nel <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>, which can be used to include and exclude Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome che identifica il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>, che consente di includere ed escludere gli oggetti di associazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If Name is `null`, bindings that have a source that is the same object as the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> participate in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Se il nome è `null`, associazioni che dispone di un'origine che è lo stesso oggetto come la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>dell'elemento con la <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>partecipazione al <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting Name of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of a binding to the same value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile includere le associazioni che dispone di un'origine diversa dal <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>dell'elemento padre che ha il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>impostando nome il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>proprietà di un'associazione sullo stesso valore.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can exclude bindings that have the same source as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting Name of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of a binding to different values.
trans-unit.target: È possibile escludere le associazioni che hanno la stessa origine <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>dell'elemento padre che ha il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>impostando nome il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>proprietà di un'associazione a valori diversi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome che identifica il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when the state of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> evento si verifica quando lo stato di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> attached event occurs on the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName>evento si verifica sull'elemento che dispone di <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when the state of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> evento si verifica quando lo stato di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> modifiche; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> viene assegnato a.

trans-unit.source: The object that this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> viene assegnato a.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> reuses target values that have not been committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> riutilizza i valori che non sono stato eseguito il commit all'origine di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A proposed value is a value that has been changed on the target of a binding, but has not been committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Un valore proposto è un valore che è stato modificato nella destinazione di un'associazione, ma non è stato eseguito il commit all'origine.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that there is a two-way binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si supponga che esista un'associazione bidirezionale in una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>e la <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the user changes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, the proposed value is the value that is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> before it is committed to source.
trans-unit.target: Se l'utente modifica il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, il valore proposto è il valore nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>prima che venga eseguito il commit all'origine.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When SharesProposedValues is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> uses the proposed value when one binding leaves the BindingGroup and another Binding with the same source joins the BindingGroup.
trans-unit.target: Quando SharesProposedValues è `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>utilizza il valore proposto quando un'associazione lascia il BindingGroup e un'altra associazione con la stessa origine si unisce al BindingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application enables a user to edit multiple fields and update the source object by clicking a button.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si supponga che un'applicazione consente all'utente di modificare più campi e aggiornare l'oggetto di origine facendo clic su un pulsante.

trans-unit.source: When a field is not being edited, the application displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Quando un campo non viene modificato, l'applicazione visualizza in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: When the user begins to edit a field, the application replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente inizia a modificare un campo, l'applicazione sostituisce la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>con un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: When the user finishes editing that field, the application replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente termina la modifica di tale campo, l'applicazione sostituisce la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>con un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Because the source is not updated until the user clicks the button, there must be a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to display the proposed value.
trans-unit.target: Poiché l'origine non viene aggiornata fino a quando l'utente fa clic sul pulsante, ci deve essere un modo per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>per visualizzare il valore proposto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: By setting SharesProposedValues to `true`, the application will display the user's changes to a field even when the source has not been updated.
trans-unit.target: Impostando SharesProposedValues su `true`, l'applicazione visualizzerà modifiche apportate le a un campo anche quando l'origine non è stato aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> reuses target values that have not been committed to the source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> riutilizza i valori che non sono stato eseguito il commit all'origine; in caso contrario, destinazione <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the proposed value for the specified property and item.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di ottenere il valore proposto per l'articolo e la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: TryGetValue returns `false` if there is not a binding for the specified item and property or if the value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce TryGetValue `false` se non è presente un'associazione per l'elemento specificato e una proprietà o se il valore della proprietà specificata non è disponibile, a causa di un errore di conversione o una precedente regola di convalida non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: Use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the value to be committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per ottenere il valore per eseguire il commit all'origine.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type `value` depends on the stage at which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo `value` dipende dalla fase in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is data bound to a property of type integer, `value` is a string if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that calls TryGetValue has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>è associata a una proprietà di tipo integer, ai dati `value` è una stringa se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>che chiamate TryGetValue dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>set di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the type of `value` is whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>è relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, il tipo di `value` corrisponde al tipo restituito dal convertitore dell'associazione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: In this example, `value` is usually an integer.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio, `value` è in genere un numero intero.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The property whose proposed value to get.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà il cui valore proposto da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the proposed property value.
trans-unit.target: Quando termina, questo metodo contiene un oggetto che rappresenta il valore della proprietà proposto.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene passato non inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if value is the proposed value for the specified property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il valore è il valore proposto per la proprietà specificata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs the converter on the binding and the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*> property set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref> and saves the values of the targets to the source objects if all the validation rules succeed.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il convertitore sull'associazione e <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> gli oggetti che hanno il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>proprietà impostata su <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>, o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref> e Salva i valori delle destinazioni di oggetti di origine se tutte le regole di convalida riuscita.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>

trans-unit.source: This method updates the source if every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> succeeds, but it does not cause the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiorna l'origine se ogni <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>ha esito positivo, ma comporta le origini per il commit delle modifiche in sospeso e terminare la transazione di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: That is, if the source object implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.
trans-unit.target: Ovvero, se l'oggetto di origine implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does not cause <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A> to be called.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo non provoca <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A>da chiamare.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> method to have the sources commit the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>metodo il commit delle modifiche in sospeso per le origini.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all validation rules succeed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tutte le regole di convalida riesca. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se includere il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When ValidatesOnNotifyDataError is `true`, the binding checks for and reports errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Quando ValidatesOnNotifyDataError è `true`, l'associazione verifica la presenza e segnala gli errori generati da un'origine dati che implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per includere il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs the converter on the binding and the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*> property set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il convertitore sull'associazione e <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> gli oggetti che hanno il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>proprietà impostata su <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>

trans-unit.source: The sources are not updated when you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Le origini non vengono aggiornate quando si chiama questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation rules succeed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le regole di convalida riesca. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> oggetti che hanno provocato il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> potrebbe non essere valido.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects that caused <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> oggetti che hanno provocato <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> potrebbe non essere valido.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no errors.
trans-unit.target: Il valore è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se non sono presenti errori.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that validate the source objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> oggetti per la convalida degli oggetti nell'origine di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> is passed in as the first parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>viene passato come primo parametro del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: You can get the proposed values of the object by using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere i valori proposti per l'oggetto utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the objects that are the sources of the bindings from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere gli oggetti che rappresentano le origini delle associazioni dal <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that validate the source objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> oggetti per la convalida degli oggetti nell'origine di <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.
